Blog.post: Hi again! And upon my failure I've somehow made sure no one could reply in this thing even the wanted members of my friends!! I've changed it again and now u guys can try commenting again! hope it works hope it works hope it works hope it works hope it works hope it works hope it

Hey guys!!-Mainly to Zo and Joanne I guess cause no one else sees it unless they register for blogspot. I made another blog just for among us friends so that we can type in a way "PRIVATELY" among us as friends so that the whole public doesn't have to put up and wonder about what we are talking about. I think it should work anyway so if u want to talk about stuff like among us sort of thing, then come here ok.

Phew, hi guys! It's finally the weekends tomorrow and have been doing endless work as finally my music exam is over!!!! I will just say it to the whole world that i got an "A" for my grade 6 flute exam!!!! I'm so happy!!! Seriously when I think I have nothin more to worry about, then here comes the gala concert...grr that stupid scholarship. ok the whole story begun when i went to this scholarship thing as my TEACHER just put me in without my response and unexpectedly get the scholarship. And there's this tradition where every year there's this huge concert where many people go to watch ppl perform and that scholarship winners have to do a solo!!!!! I'm so bastard!!!!! Man i hate it when this happens...its always like this....anyway i think i've whinged enough for one day!!:P

I come from a family where my dad's a singaporean and mum is a japanese. So this gives me a huge advantage when coming to getting the latest info on the latest games that squaresoft makes and produce. One such project that is coming out soon is the movie DVD Final Fantasy vii Advent Children!!!!!! I've been waiting for like i since don't know when. Espeacially with the fact that this only comes out in Japan, I can't wait till I get hold of it. Man am i lucky to be born partly japanese or what!! This is gonna be so exciting with the fact that I already finished the japanese Final Fantasy VII!!!! I just wanta know what the new sort of threat is and that what actually happens after the game itself. The trailer itself was good enough for me to just want it even more!!! UURRRRRRRRRGGGGGGGHHHHHH!!!!!(*_*)

Hey Guys!! And to my friends who will know the trouble that I was having to get to the right place :P - I finally managed to register into the right place!!!:D It took me a while but hey I finally managed it didn't I!? But anyway I just want to say to everyone, and I mean everyone including my friends and everyone else who is using 'Blogspot' to feel free and chat to me and I hope I can find some newer pals half way across the world!? :P
